txt.en: Bingo is outside his hobbit-hole in Michel Delving, north of the Town Hole.\n\nBingo's dinner party was a rousing success, and he wishes to thank you for all your help.
Talk to Bingo outside his home in Michel Delving
Bingo is inside his hobbit-hole in Michel Delving, north of the Town Hole.
The day of Bingo's party has finally arrived.
'The day has finally arrived, my friend! I have a few more preparations to make in order to get my home presentable for guests, but I am nearly ready! Let me know if you are willing to help!'

'Well, let's see. I have a few more things to do to get ready, but it might be easiest if you go outside and keep an eye out for my guests!'

<rgb=#FF0000>This is a Solo quest and cannot be completed with a Fellowship.</rgb>
'I have a few more things to do to get ready.'
'I must confess I am sad to see our journey end!'
Talk to Bingo inside his hobbit-hole to prepare for the party

'Well, [placeholder], I do not know what to say. We have been through so much together on this journey... I must confess I am sad to see it end!

'I have made so many friends on this adventure, and I think the attendance at my party has proven I made even more than I realized when I was writing out the invitations! But none of them are as dear to me as you, [placeholder]. You are quite the [placeholder], and a loyal friend. You are welcome to call at my humble home any time!

'I must see to finishing my book, and once that is done, who can say? I have had a taste of adventure, and what is a book without a sequel? Oh, I am only teasing, [placeholder]. Mostly.

'Farewell for now, my good friend! I will see you again, and I look forward to the tales we will tell on that day!'

<rgb=#00FF00>Bert Bartleby has arrived outside Bingo's home in Michel Delving.</rgb>

<rgb=#FF0000>Thank you for playing through The Ballad of Bingo Boffin!</rgb>
